custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: ALatentPlace
custom_nodes.title: YANC_LMStudio
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for a LMStudio integration into ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: fairy-root
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-OpenAI-FM
custom_nodes.description: The OpenAI FM TTS node is a custom node for ComfyUI that seamlessly integrates the OpenAI FM Text-to-Speech service into your audio workflows. This node allows you to easily convert text to speech with a variety of voices and emotional styles directly within ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: mw
custom_nodes.title: MW-ComfyUI_EraX-WoW-Turbo
custom_nodes.description: Super fast multilingual speech recognition model based on Whisper Large-v3 Turbo. A node for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: mw
custom_nodes.title: MW-ComfyUI_gemmax
custom_nodes.description: XiaoMi GemmaX: Support 28 languages, Multilingual Translator based on Gemma. A node for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: svetozarov
custom_nodes.title: AS_LLM_nodes
custom_nodes.description: This ComfyUI extension provides custom nodes for working with Google Gemini and OpenAI ChatGPT.

custom_nodes.author: LAOGOU-666
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-Memory_Cleanup
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension that provides nodes for memory cleanup, including VRAM and RAM cleanup functions to optimize ComfyUI performance during long running workflows.

custom_nodes.author: Andro-Meta
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Ovis2
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node set for integrating [a/Ovis2](https://huggingface.co/AIDC-AI/Ovis2-34B), a powerful multimodal large language model designed to analyze images and videos.

custom_nodes.author: abuzreq
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Model Bending
custom_nodes.description: Use model bending to push your model beyond its visuals' limits. These nodes allow you to apply transformations to the intemediate densoising steps during sampling, e.g. add, multiplty, scale, rotate, dilate, erode ..etc.

custom_nodes.author: blovett80

custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension for using PixelDojo's Flux API to generate high-quality images directly within ComfyUI workflows.

custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that simulates Photoshop's 'Flatten Image' functionality.

custom_nodes.author: zaheenrahman
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ColorCorrection
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that performs color correction on clothing in face-swapped images. This node helps maintain the original clothing color when using face swap tools, addressing common color shifts that occur during the face swap process.

custom_nodes.author: CHAOSEA

custom_nodes.description: Create a custom node to select the closest images semantically to an input prompt

custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-SparkTTS is a custom ComfyUI node implementation of SparkTTS, an advanced text-to-speech system that harnesses the power of large language models (LLMs) to generate highly accurate and natural-sounding speech.

custom_nodes.author: joreyaesh
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Touchpad Scroll Controller
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension that enhances touchpad navigation by redirecting two-finger scrolling over to the canvas, including over textareas. This can prevent accidental back/forward browser navigation when using horizontal touchpad gestures and provides smooth zooming and panning for Mac and other touchpad users.

custom_nodes.title: IF_VideoPrompts
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI extension for video-based prompting and processing with support for various models and video processing capabilities

custom_nodes.description: Run Local and API LLMs, Features Conditioning manipulation via Omost, supports Ollama, LlamaCPP LMstudio, Koboldcpp, TextGen, Transformers or via APIs Anthropic, Groq, OpenAI, Google Gemini, Mistral, xAI and create your own charcters assistants (SystemPrompts) with custom presets and muchmore

custom_nodes.description: A simple set of nodes to generate a point cloud from an image and its depth map, perform transformations and some basic operations.

custom_nodes.author: pixelworldai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AlphaFlatten
custom_nodes.description: This node takes a batch of images with alpha channels (RGBA format) and combines them into a single image, respecting the transparency of each layer. It's particularly useful for compositing multiple masked elements (like faces) into a single image.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI NSFW Filter
custom_nodes.description: A simple and effective ComfyUI custom node for filtering inappropriate text content, automatically detecting and replacing prohibited words while preserving the original format.

custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for various visual generation and editing tasks using ACE_Plus FFT Model.

custom_nodes.author: notagen-mw
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_NotaGen
custom_nodes.description: Symbolic Music Generation, NotaGen node for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_KV_Edit
custom_nodes.description: KV-Edit: Training-Free Image Editing for Precise Background Preservation,you can use it in comfyUI

custom_nodes.author: mit-han-lab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-nunchaku
custom_nodes.description: Nunchaku ComfyUI Node. Nunchaku is the inference that supports SVDQuant. SVDQuant is a new post-training training quantization paradigm for diffusion models, which quantize both the weights and activations of FLUX.1 to 4 bits, achieving 3.5× memory and 8.7× latency reduction on a 16GB laptop 4090 GPU. See more details: https://github.com/mit-han-lab/nunchaku

custom_nodes.author: billwuhao
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_DiffRhythm
custom_nodes.description: Blazingly Fast and Embarrassingly Simple End-to-End Full-Length Song Generation. A node for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: Visionatrix
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RemoteVAE
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Nodes for Remote VAE Decoding.

custom_nodes.author: markuryy
custom_nodes.title: Video XY Plot
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: joreyaesh
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Scroll Over Textarea
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension to allow textarea elements to be scrolled over. Useful when using a trackpad in order to prevent accidental forward/back navigation (two fingers horizontally on a Mac) when scrolling around the UI.

custom_nodes.author: SSsnap
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Ad-scheduler
custom_nodes.description: For denoising tasks that handle noise at any time period, with the ability to add noise in post-processing to enhance details or correct structural accuracy while maintaining the original similarity. Allocating more steps allows the image to regress to an earlier stage..

custom_nodes.author: iDAPPA
custom_nodes.title: AMD GPU Monitor for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A simple, lightweight AMD GPU monitoring tool for ComfyUI that displays real-time information about your AMD GPU directly in the UI.

custom_nodes.author: orssorbit
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-wanBlockswap
custom_nodes.description: This is a simple Wan block swap node for ComfyUI native nodes, works by swapping upto 40 blocks to the CPU to reduce VRAM.
